mapper.insert: insert into tblHealth (healthseq, subject, content, subcategory, regdate, viewcnt, requestcnt, matching, img, wishdate, address, price, id) values (seqHealth.nextval, #{subject}, #{content}, #{subcategory}, default, default, default, default, #{img, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,#{wishdate} , #{address} ,#{price} , #{id} )
mapper.select: select * from tblHealth order by healthseq desc
mapper.update: update tblhealth set viewcnt = viewcnt + 1 where healthseq = #{healthseq}
mapper.select: select count(*) from tblhealthreq where healthseq = #{healthseq}
